class.name: Reference
class.description: Base class for any object that keeps a reference count. [Resource] and many other helper objects inherit this class. References keep an internal reference counter so that they are automatically released when no longer in use, and only then. References therefore do not need to be freed manually with [method Object.free]. In the vast majority of use cases, instantiating and using [Reference]-derived types is all you need to do. The methods provided in this class are only for advanced users, and can cause issues if misused.

method.name: init_ref
method.description: Initializes the internal reference counter. Use this only if you really know what you are doing. Returns whether the initialization was successful.

method.name: reference
method.description: Increments the internal reference counter. Use this only if you really know what you are doing. Returns whether the increment was successful.

method.name: unreference
method.description: Decrements the internal reference counter. Use this only if you really know what you are doing. Returns whether the decrement was successful.
